name: LONG-LASTING FOUNDATION - SPF 15
description: A lightweight foundation that provides full coverage with a natural finish. Infused with SPF 15 to protect the skin from harmful UV rays. The foundation blends seamlessly, leaving the skin hydrated and radiant all day.

name: SHINE CONTROL PRIMER
description: A mattifying primer that controls excess shine, minimizes pores, and creates a smooth canvas for makeup application. Keeps your makeup looking fresh and long-lasting.

name: REJUVENATING FACE MASK
description: This face mask is enriched with vitamins and beta-carotene to rejuvenate the skin. Helps reduce signs of aging, improves skin tone, and boosts hydration. Suitable for all skin types.

name: HYDRATING LIP GLOSS
description: A nourishing lip gloss that provides long-lasting hydration while delivering a high-shine finish. Available in various shades for a glossy and plump lip look.

name: HAIR REPAIR SERUM
description: This serum repairs damaged hair, providing intense nourishment and restoring natural shine. Ideal for dry, brittle, or chemically treated hair. The lightweight formula ensures smooth and silky hair without any residue.

name: VOLUME BOOST HAIR SPRAY
description: Provides a lasting hold and gives your hair a voluminous boost. This spray ensures that your hairstyle stays in place without feeling sticky or heavy.

name: CURL DEFINING MOUSSE
description: A lightweight mousse that defines and enhances curls, giving them body and structure. Perfect for achieving soft, bouncy, and frizz-free curls.

name: HIGHLIGHTER PALETTE - GOLDEN GLOW
description: A highlighter palette with warm golden shades to enhance your natural glow. Easy to blend and perfect for creating a luminous, dewy finish on your face and body.
